title: Deadly Games (1995-1996)
description:
Starring: Cynthia Gibb,Christopher Lloyd, Levar Burton, (Brent Spiner)
A few notable episodes directed by Leonard Nimoy

Deadly Games is an American comedy action sci fi show. The basic plot of the show is about video game characters that come to life, re-enacting their deadly plans for wanton destruction and world domination in the real world. The first episode introduces the protagonist, Dr. Gus Lloyd, a matters-physicist, engineer and video game designer who has created a live-action game in his spare time to exert his indignant feelings about people in his life who have all made his life hell on Earth (his father, his ex-wife's mother, his ex-wife's divorce lawyer, his ex-girlfriend, his former employer, a high school football-Quarterback bully, his old camp counselor, etc.); the villains of the game are modeled after all these people. 

Includes these episodes:

S01e01 - Killshot
S01e02 - One Mean Mother
S01e03 - The Boss
S01e04 - The End of the Jackal
S01e05 - The Camp Counselor pt1
S01e06 - The Camp Counselor pt2
S01e07 - The Practical Joker
S01e08 - The Car Mechanic
S01e09 - The Divorce Lawyer
S01e10 - The Motivational Speaker
S01e11 - The Trash Man
S01e12 - Dr. Kramer


The last 5 minutes of the final episode "S01e12 - Dr. Kramer" are cut out I was not able to get it.  Additionally there's another episode which never aired on UPN called "S01e13 - The Ex-Girlfriend".  If anyone has the last 5 minutes of episode 12 or episode 13 could you make a new torrent or get in contact with me through the comments  Thanks.
